introPage.title: THIS IS THE TITLE (w/ feedback)
introPage.introduction: A multiple-choice H5P Question Set made with h5p-mcq-maker (with feedback).

params.question: Which one of the following is a number?

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: Correct, this is a counting number.
tipsAndFeedback.notChosenFeedback: Yes, we use numbers for counting!

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: Not quite, this is the 16th letter of the English alphabet.
tipsAndFeedback.notChosenFeedback: This is the 16th letter of the English alphabet.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: Not quite, this is the 17th letter of the English alphabet.
tipsAndFeedback.notChosenFeedback: This is the 17th letter of the English alphabet.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: Not quite, this is the 18th letter of the English alphabet.
tipsAndFeedback.notChosenFeedback: This is the 18th letter od the English alphabet.

params.question: Which one of the following is a letter?

tipsAndFeedback.notChosenFeedback: Written in letters this is\(\colon\) ONE.
Written in letters this is\(\colon\) TWO.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: Correct, this it the first letter of the English alphabet.
tipsAndFeedback.notChosenFeedback: This is the first letter of the English alphabet!

params.question: The tenths digit of the number 7,654.321 is _____.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: Not quite. This is the units or ones digit.
tipsAndFeedback.notChosenFeedback: This is the units or ones digit.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: Not quite. This is the units or tens digit.
tipsAndFeedback.notChosenFeedback: This is the units or tens digit.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: Not quite. This is the units or hundreds digit.
tipsAndFeedback.notChosenFeedback: This is the units or hundreds digit.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: Correct. Indeed, this is the tenths digit.
